attributes.title: What a strange app
attributes.review: After you download the app the only way to proceed is to build a shrine with a  Cheeto in the middle. Being the brainless dumby I am I did for our “FANTASTIC”   President. Turns out this shrine makes him one shade more orange. Real shame about the ninjas tho.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: this app kept on crashing and making my ipad glitch i believe there’s a hacker on it. also it has a orange in the app i’m really scared. I’ve been trying to buy things on my ipad but it doesn’t even WORK anymore cuz THIS APP STOLE ALL MY MONEY

attributes.title: Well
attributes.review: This app in general isn’t too bad even though it’s kinda glitchy. As myself being a republican I think it’s a cool thought, but taking away TikTok is a no no so that’s why a see a 1 Star review fit.

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Once downloaded it instantly closed and wouldn’t allow me to log on. Once I finally got it to work I kept seeing a big ugly man instead of my beautiful president ❤️😌 do not download!!!!
Absolutely TERRIBLE!! Took forever to actually download on my device and once it did left LOADS of bugs and viruses. Do NOT download if you don’t want your phone to glitch for weeks!!

attributes.title: don’t download the appppp😨😤💀
attributes.review: This is the dumbest app that the orange Cheeto puff could make it completely crashed my phone 🙄 and my boomer family was SCREECHING over it like they were going REEEEEEEEE DOWNLOAD ITTTT so I did and 😤 crashes we have to take my phone to the phone store go fix it DUMB CHEETO PUFF PRESIDENT

attributes.title: I can’t use it
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and they also tried to hack my phone. This app needs to be taken off the App StoreImmediately before it  Destroys someone else phone I hate the app .

attributes.title: Do not get this app
attributes.review: awful awful app. wouldn’t recommend at all. it hacked all my stuff and took my money. everything it says is lies and it’s still annoying

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: It kept making my phone turn off and when I download the app I could not touch other apps but that one 😤don’t download this app plz it is a waste of time

attributes.title: AWFUL THIS IS THE WORST
attributes.review: this is probably the WORST APP i have EVER downloaded. It took two whole months to download. and once i got it downloaded it just had this ugly orange on the cover. AWFUL it gave my phone and virus and it killed it. I would NEVER BUY THIS APP ever.
